channel.title: CVE Feed for AguardNet -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AguardNet -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6742|2024-07-16T13:20:34.863Z -- aguardnet -- space%20management%20system
item.description: AguardNet Technology's Space Management System does not properly filter user input, allowing remote attackers with regular privileges to inject JavaScript and perform Reflected Cross-site scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-6743|2024-07-15T06:07:46.528Z -- aguardnet -- space%20management%20system
item.description: AguardNet's Space Management System does not properly validate user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject arbitrary SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database contents.

item.title: CVE-2024-6742|2024-07-15T05:55:32.052Z -- aguardnet -- space%20management%20system
item.description: AguardNet Technology's Space Management System does not properly filter user input, allowing remote attackers with regular privileges to inject JavaScript and perform Reflected Cross-site scripting attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-6743|2024-07-15T19:26:04.077Z -- aguardnet -- space%20management%20system
item.description: AguardNet's Space Management System does not properly validate user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject arbitrary SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database contents.
